price: 25. Waxaan dhab ahaan u dirnay Nuux qolodiisii (isagoo leh): Waxaan idiin ahay dige cad.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā nūḥan ilā qawmihi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
